Headline: 7 followers
Comment:
Building regenerative food systems which can provide affordable, safe and nutrient dense food while improving soil health, fighting climate change and increasing farmerâ€™s income. 
Addressing issues from prodiction to consumption through regenerative production methods, traceability, grassroot extension, community building and respecting bio-induviduality. 
This involves utilising various tools like biologically complete compost, carbon based foliar spray protocol, utilising traditional knowledge of companion planting, farm prepared and commercially profuced biological innoculants, customised testing of farm health parameters, human diagnostics like food allergy/sensitivity tedt, gut health test etc. and building community through social media platforms. 
Driving mass adoption of regenerative agriculture practices and producing food based on personalised consumer requirement and changing the perspective of the consumer from viewing food as a commodity to considering it as health care is the key here. 
Supporting farmers and working with community awareness should ho hand in hand to bring transformation in how we produce and consume food.

Headline: | HEALTHCARE | SOCIAL IMPACT | Sociology Geek with a Technical Flair|
Comment:
Dilip Kumar,Glad you asked the question.
We are building CYCLESYNC, an AI-powered period tracker that helps women track their cycles, flag symptoms of PCOS and hormonal imbalances, and personalize their diet, fitness, and work routines based on their cycle phases.
Tailoring daily habits to the menstrual cycle is essential because a womanâ€™s hormones influence energy levels, mood, and productivity throughout the month. By aligning diet, exercise, and work schedules to these natural changes, women can clinically improve their health, reduce stress, and enhance their overall well-being. This approach also supports early detection of health issues, empowering women with better tools to manage their health effectively, a need in India where women's health is underserved and underdiagnosed.

Headline: Founder @ DÄ“ha Training Studio | Rehabilitation and biomechanics Specialist
Comment:
DÄ“ha Training Studio: Revolutionizing Pain Management and Movement Optimization

At DÄ“ha, we are building a cutting-edge personal training studio dedicated to healing and empowering individuals dealing with chronic pain, while helping them achieve optimal fitness.

Our unique approach integrates:
	â€¢	Diaphragm Function & Breathing: Improving core stability and functional movement.
	â€¢	Rehabilitation: Helping clients recover effectively and avoid invasive surgeries.
	â€¢	Strength Training: Ensuring long-term resilience and improved performance.

We understand that the site of pain is often not the root cause. For example, knee pain may stem from poor foot mechanics or limited hip mobility. Thatâ€™s why we go beyond conventional methods with a comprehensive biomechanics assessment to identify movement restrictions and dysfunctions throughout the body.

Our evidence-based methodology helps restore natural movement patterns, re-educates the body, and allows our clients to live pain-free, active lives. This innovative, holistic approach has already transformed the lives of individuals struggling with pain, enabling them to avoid surgeries and regain confidence in their bodies.

Comment:
Dilip Kumar, In partnership with CoReCo Technologies Private Limited, I am building a health app called 1Step.

It is essentially a technology implementation of the concepts presented in the book Atomic Habits by James Clear, applied to the personal health improvement context. We have come up with 20 atomic habits which can improve one's health, and dramatically if these habits are stacked on top of each other. These habits together constitute the '1Step Approach' and belong to one of 3 categories: 1) Build a Solid Foundation, 2) Strengthen the Body, and 3) Strengthen the Mind.

There are a couple of neat GenAI use cases in this app which we are implementing right now and will be live in a couple of months. And of course, ML will be required to 'hyper-personalize' the '1Step Approach' for every user.

1Step has 3 modules: Learn, Do, and Track.
1) 'Learn' module contains self-paced courses, live courses, and expert talks.
2) 'Do' module contains atomic habits to improve one's health (10 to begin with) as well as online classes (3 to begin with).
3) 'Track' module contains ways to track the changes that people go through when they start making changes to their diet, exercise, and lifestyle.

We are launching on 6-Jan-2025.

Comment:
One of the biggest challenges we notice is how people lose interest in sports when they move to metro cities and start jobs. Itâ€™s a reality many professionals faceâ€” Dilip Kumar, youâ€™ve mentioned multiple times how difficult it was to focus on health earlier in your career, before you start marathon.
At PlaySpots, weâ€™re on a mission to make sports accessible and enjoyable for everyone because sports is the answer to this challenge. It supports physical fitness and plays a vital role in mental well-being, fostering healthier lifestyles across the board.
In 2024, we facilitated over 1 million games and are now exploring collaborations with corporates to offer sports game tokens/coupons for employees, encouraging them to stay active. By bringing sports back into daily life, especially in urban settings, we aim to inspire a healthier, more active India.
Looking forward to connecting with like-minded partners to make 2025 the year of impact!

Headline: Engineering Enthusiastic
Comment:
Dilip Kumar Yupmedi is an innovative healthcare platform that empowers doctors and labs to connect with patients through a hybrid model, fostering lasting relationships. Our solution streamlines chronic disease management and enhances patient care with personalized, long-term packages.
In our long-term packages, patients or remote healthcare professionals can feed medical observations into the app, enabling continuous monitoring and expert suggestions from in-house or remote specialists.
What sets Yupmedi apart is its unique feature that allows healthcare professionals and labs to create their own branded portals. These portals serve as dedicated websites where they can list services, offer packages, and manage appointments seamlessly.
With Yupmedi, healthcare is more than just accessibleâ€”itâ€™s personal, proactive, and future-ready.
